description:
The final season of Pretty Little Liars finally has a premiere date.《美少女的谎言》最后一季开播时间确认。

Freeform announced Friday that the show's final run of episodes will premiere on Tuesday, April 18 at 8/7c, followed by the premiere of the new series Famous in Love, starring Bella Thorne, at 9/8c.Freeform周五宣布，这部剧的最后一部分将会在北京时间4月19日播出，而接档这部剧的将会是Bella Thorne主演的新剧《Famous in Love》。

The episodes will mark the conclusion of the seventh and final season of the show, the first half of which aired this year. Series creator I. Marlene King has teased that one of the Liars will get married before the end of the season.《美少女的谎言》第七季将会是这部剧的最后一季，今年已经播出上半段。本剧制片人I. Marlene King透露，剧中一位美少女将会在季终前上演结婚的剧情。

As previously announced, the series finale will be a two-hour episode .之前曾有报道，《美少女的谎言》季终集将会是两小时的超长特别集。

title: 《美少女的谎言》季终时间确认
